creator: Ryan.Lubke@Sun.COM
text:
The ServletToJSPErrorPageTest and ServletToServletErrorPageTest need to be
reworked.  Currently, the tests use a goldenfiles to validate the output. 
However, it was never considered that in the case of an Error page, a vendor
could potentially augment the error message stored in the
javax.servlet.error.message request attribute (The spec doesnt' state that this
is illegal, see section ).  

The tests should be altered to perform an indexOf against the message, as well
as perform internal checks of the other items.  Goldenfile use should be
discontinued for these tests.
